internal.content: --- title: Getting help description: Getting help --- export const Title = () => ( Getting help ); Thank you for your interest in Elyra! General questions Create an issue or feature request Join the weekly community meeting Elyra chat room ## General questions Share your questions and ideas with the community in the [GitHub discussion forum](https://github.com/elyra-ai/elyra/discussions). ![elyra discussion forum](../images/ai/elyra-discussion-forum.png) ## Create an issue or feature request If you encounter a problem or have suggestions for improvements please [open an issue](https://github.com/elyra-ai/elyra/issues) on GitHub. ![create a new issue](../images/ai/submit-issue.png) ## Join the weekly community meeting The Elyra community meeting is held [online](https://ibm.webex.com/meet/akchin) every Thursday at [9AM Pacific](https://www.thetimezoneconverter.com/?t=9%3A00%20am&tz=San%20Francisco&) (excluding holidays). ## Elyra chat room You can reach many Elyra contributors in the [Elyra community](https://gitter.im/elyra-ai/community) on gitter. ![AI Pipeline in editor](../images/ai/gitter.png)
